ESRI_ItemInformation.name: USA Counties
ESRI_ItemInformation.snippet: This group layer presents the counties of the United States in the 50 states, the District of Columbia, and Puerto Rico. It provides detailed boundaries below 1:3m scale and generalized boundaries above 1:3m scale.
ESRI_ItemInformation.description: This group layer presents the counties of the United States in the 50 states, the District of Columbia, and Puerto Rico. Below 1:3m scale it provides detailed boundaries that are consistent with the tract, block group, and state datasets and are effective at county, regional, and state levels. Above 1:3m scale the county boundaries are generalized to improve draw performance and be used effectively at a national level and have no Puerto Rico data.
ESRI_ItemInformation.summary: This group layer presents the counties of the United States in the 50 states, the District of Columbia, and Puerto Rico. It provides detailed boundaries below 1:3m scale and generalized boundaries above 1:3m scale.
ESRI_ItemInformation.title: USA Counties
ESRI_ItemInformation.tags: layer, polygon, area, population, detail, households, demographics, society, boundaries, farming, United States, U.S. Counties, Counties, Puerto Rico, 2010, 2018
